custom_steps_separated.content: Launch Firefox and open the `Browser Console` from menu [≡] → select `Developer` → select `Browser Console`.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
- Firefox is successfully launched.
- The `Browser Console` is successfully opened.
The user is able to install any compatible add-ons from AMO.

custom_steps_separated.content: Install [new add-ons from AMO](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/extensions/?sort=created)'s newest additions section.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user is able to install any compatible add-ons from AMO.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Test these add-ons for:
- rendering issues
- functional issues
- performance issues
- crashes

**⚠ NOTE** Pay particular attention to any problems seen after updating Firefox with add-ons installed.
custom_steps_separated.expected: There are no issues encountered while using any of the add-ons in question.

0.title: Popular add-ons work as expected while performing everyday tasks
